alert.note: Alert for Big Horn; Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 9:22PM MDT until July 24 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR WESTERN BIG HORN AND NORTHEASTERN PARK COUNTIES... At 920 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Shell to 8 miles south of Ralston, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. The Powell airport at 835 PM measured a wind gust of 68 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Some power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... Shell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms are producing wind damage across northern Bighorn Basin. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
